page.title: 08INSTITUTE OF OCEANOGRAPHY
page.content: they wear suits for special occasions. At sea,they wear strong protective clothes,with helmet type hats and strong boots. In 1975 they had a bad accident when one of their ships caught fire.No one from the Wormley Institute was hurt.A fisherman from Suffolk was killed.They don't have any of their own ships but they are part of a bigger organisation which gives them access to ships. There is an instrument called{GLORIA, which stands for Geological Long Range Incline Asdic,which they tow .25 miles behind the ship and 200 metres deep, and it can take photographs 20 miles away by sound waves.
